A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi takes bold twists and turns and features fantastic character development. Although the movie is in many ways strikingly different than its predecessors\, Rian Johnson has created a gorgeous film that explores elements of the Star Wars universe in new and exciting ways. Fans should not expect a rehash of the Original Trilogy. Despite my high expectations\, I was not let down. Johnson's take on Star Wars is truley unique and impressive.
